pkgmetadata.longdescription: apk-signer============================================================| Easy to use apk signing.. code-block:: sh pip install apk-signer .. code-block:: sh $ apk-signer sample.apk [Warning] Signing with default keystore. [Warning] Please pass --key_path, --key_alias, --key_pass, --ks_pass parameter, if you want to use your keystore > sample-signed.apk $ apk-signer sample.apk --key_path="sample.jks" --key_alias="sample" --key_pass="sample_key" --ks_pass="sample_ks" > sample-signed.apk $ apk-signer sample.apk --run > Success > Performing Streamed Install\nSuccess > Starting: Intent { cmp=com.sample.activty/.MainActivity }
